tabPanelDiagnostic.title: Diagnostic Panel

tabPanelDiagnostic.confirmDeleteRelationRoot: Are you sure that you want to delete the relation with the panel {{panel}}? The current one will become a root panel.
tabPanelDiagnostic.confirmDeleteRelationChild: Are you sure that you want to delete the relation with the panel {{panel}}? This panel {{panel}} will be left without ascendats.You can delete it along with its unique descendants or leave it as root panel.

messages.chooseDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete the panel? There are panels that will be left without ascenders. You can delete them along with their unique descendants or leave them as the root panel.

messages.success: Panel Set has been created successfully
messages.errorConflict: Already exist a panel collection with the same identifier or name.
messages.importPopupMessage_1: Select the collection panels diagnostic file (.json or .zip)

messages.importError422_InvalidRef: Error: some panels contain references to panels that do not exist.
messages.importError422_FutureDates: Error: Dates cannot be in the future!
messages.importError422_InvalidTranscript: Error: There are panels with invalid genomic entities (transcripts, genes, variants or regions).
messages.importError422_InvalidAssociations: Error: There are panels with invalid associations (HPO, ICD-10).
messages.importError422_InvalidGenes: Error: There are panels with invalid genomic entities (transcripts, genes, variants or regions).
messages.importError422_InvalidNumberOfPanels: Error: There is more than one current panel.
messages.importError422_PanelsCoexist: Error: There are some panels inside of the collection with the same name or id that coexists in the same period of time.
messages.importError422_Author: The Author does not exit in the system!
messages.importErrorInvalidFile: Error: invalid files cannot be imported
